{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with 1320376 ONTARIO.

Across 7 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 4 have at least one amendment (57%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 15% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$2.1M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.81 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$2.1M. The longest contract was 1.74 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$6.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
